p: Statistical analysis. Statistical analysis was performed using IBM SPSS Statistics for Windows, Version 24.0 (Armonk, NY: IBM Corp.). Continuous values were expressed as mean or median (range) and categorical data as frequencies (percentages). Student’s t-test or Mann-Whitney U test was performed to compare means. Chi-square or Fisher’s exact test were performed for categorical variables. All tests were two-tailed. A p-level of < 0.05 was considered significant.
